import React from 'react'
import { Form, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'


export default function SearchForm({params,onParamChange}) {
    return (
        <Form className="mb-4">
            <Form.Row className="align-items-end">
                <Form.Group as={Col}>
                    <Form.Label>Description</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control onChange={onParamChange} value={params.description} 
                    name="description" type="text"/>
                </Form.Group>
                <Form.Group as={Col}>
                    <Form.Label>Location</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control onChange={onParamChange} value={params.location} 
                    name="location" type="text"/>
                </Form.Group>
                <Form.Group as = {Col} xs="auto" className="ml-2">
                  <Form.Check onChange={onParamChange} 
                  value={params.full_time} name="full_time" id="full-time"
                  label="Only Full Time" type="checkbox" className="mb-2"/>
                  </Form.Group>
            </Form.Row>
        </Form>
    )
}
